website_summaries.verdict: Cats love crinkly sounds and hiding in small, dark places. This tunnel provides both. A great place to roll, play, or nap.
pros: A small "window" lets cat look out
Exciting textures (crinkly on the inside, soft on the outside)
Multiple products interconnect to form a maze
cons: Not big enough for very large cats

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, my cat loves it, and it's easy to fold and pack in when travel in with your kitty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Michailova

customer_reviews.title: I'm not going in there.
customer_reviews.text: I personnally love the cat tunnel. I would've given it 5 stars, except my cat won't go in it. Maybe it should be called a kitten tunnel. I will give it to my daughter. She has a super small cat.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn D.

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT'S FAVORITE TOY!!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has 2 of these and 2 of the 3 way tunnels. He plays with it a lot. It is so cool how they all tie together! Very durable and don't expect any problems with any of the sections. Your cat or doggy needs this toy...lol We put them together in the long straightaway configuration last night (see pics). If you buy extras they can be set up in all kinds of layouts, just depends on what you cat likes.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S.

customer_reviews.title: The size!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than perceived, my cat can play in it but this is definitely suited for a small kitten, not an average kitten. He can’t turn around while inside and he is an average size 6 month old kitten, he really wants to play in there but he’s pressed for space. I will be sending it back. Looking for a larger one!
customer_reviews.author: corinna

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty toy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that are best friends, and their main home is in the laundry room. They spend a lot of time in there when I have company as I don't want to risk them slipping outside the opening door into the desert due to so many rogue coyotes. I got them one of these amazing crinkle tunnels for Christmas, and they adore it! They love playing cat and mouse as they take turns racing through it and chasing one another. Now I can't hardly get them to come out of their room as they are too enamored with the tunnel. Great toy for my little meows!
customer_reviews.author: bmbranno

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for a nylon tube that my cat had begun to shred. I like that it's a combination of soft and fuzzy and has a crinkly interior. The only issue with it is that it's much, much smaller than all the other tubes I've seen and had. My cat isn't that big but after weeks of it sitting here, she still won't venture more than her upper half into it. It's really more appropriate for kittens than full grown cats.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Chocula

customer_reviews.title: My Kittens Love This!
customer_reviews.text: My kittens (three little ones) love the crinkle-noise tunnel. They were instantly mesmerized by the crinkly noises and ran in and out of the tunnel for a while until they got tired out--then they all curled up, all three in a pile, and slept in it. Two of the kittens have emerged to play with other toys, but Mike the cat never goes far from the tunnel and has brought his other toys (little furry mice) inside. Product was easy to assemble (took one second), cats love it, it's of excellent quality. Cats are so finicky about food and toys, you never know what they'll like, but they loved this.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann LeQuang

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this, it's his favorite place to sit while hunting for toys as we play. I bought two and linked them together so he has a little more of a maze to go through. The fleece on the rim looks nice as well as the outer shell which gives it a more upscale look compared to others. It is more expensive but definitely worth the price if you don't want something super cheap looking. The inside has a crinkle to it, which yes adds some noise (though I think they all have this anyway), but can add to the play time because they react to the noise.
customer_reviews.author: MegaB

customer_reviews.title: Kitty heaven....
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy this because my cat loved playing with a big ugly bag filled with newspaper that I didn't want to look at in my living room any longer. It took her a bit to transition but now she loves it. The first picture is a little misrepresentational because it almost appears as a bag, but the cat is actually looking out of a hole in the middle of the tube. (scroll down for a better picture of what it looks like) My cat loves it when we toss a small toy into the hole then she does the wiggle,wiggle,wiggle before darting in to retrieve it. And like most cats, she loves the crinkly sound! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: phyllis m cantil

customer_reviews.title: Give it time
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought my boys hated this toy, they didn’t seem interested at all. Then in the middle of the night it sounded like a roommate was wrapping presents (purchased around Christmas time) but it was so late so I went to see what was up and it was my boys having a blast with this! They seem to play with it in phases now, disinterest one week and won’t play with anything else the next. When I’m using the cat wand, I’ll have the worm at one end of the tunnel and my boy will run to the other side to wind up and then pounce through the tunnel to catch his prey. It’s adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch title
customer_reviews.text: Literally says "with attachments" in title, but then says they are seperate in the description.
customer_reviews.author: careybou

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats that weigh about 10 lbs each. That is about the maximum size cat that can comfortably play with this. My 6 year old cat loves it. The younger 2 year old cat is less interested - maybe because it's been taken over by the other cat. I'm a little concerned that the older cat will bite off the plastic connectors on one end that can be used to link multiple cat tunnels. It seems unlikely, but I removed them off in any case.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: What a joy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this and the minute I put it down one of my cats ran right in and she had not stopped going in and out. She’s fascinated and excited and so happy. It’s makes a crinkly sound when she goes through it. She sits in it too and rolls in it. The tunnel also rolls /moves from her movements. Am so happy I found this for her and my other cat and eventually the little kitten when she will be ready to meet my 9 month old kitty and my one year and 4 months kitty.
customer_reviews.author: MonicaW

customer_reviews.title: Cat scared of it and won't go near it
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be fun for her and I bought it based on other reviews. Unfortunately my 5-yr-old cat is never going to use it or go into it after trying for over a week to play with her. She loves to chase string but she won't even go near the tunnel even if the string goes in it. She gets startled when she hears the crinkling sound if we move it and runs under the bed. Oh well at least it wasn't expensive. Gave it three stars because it's not inherently bad but it's definitely not for our Sophie.
customer_reviews.author: KiraLaura

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Easy to clean.  Easy to collapse/store away.  Great design.  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. My two one-year old boys have gotten over playing with this tunnel. But I just adopted two kittens, about 2 months old, and they wrestle, play, hide and seek, and really enjoy the tunnel. I think the older cats are getting back into it too because they see how much fun the two kittens are having. It's very easy to clean, I would often vacuum the puffy white edges, which can build up some cat hair. The product is also super easy to collapse and store away to save space. I just leave it open underneath two chairs in my living room and the kittens spend hours running and chasing each other through it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: A great toy keeping cats of all ages busy
customer_reviews.text: I am a first time cat owner. I bought this for my 9-week old kitten and she loves it! she zooms through the tunnel, paws at the outside to hear the crinkle sound, and the hole through the middle gives me an opportunity to play with a "fishing toy" and she plays until she goes to find a bed to have a nap. This item closes up easily and is very small to store.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE BARRON

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for more than cats!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I don't even have a cat! LOL! I bought the tunnel for my Guinea pigs and rabbits to run and hop through. They like to have fun exploring too, though maybe not quite as much as cats. Being that they are prey animals and cats aren't, my guys were a little cautious at first, but once they decided it was safe to hop/run through and around the tunnel, they love it! They go through it all the time when it would be just as easy to go alongside of it because going through it must be way more fun!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Murphree

customer_reviews.title: Not just for cats
customer_reviews.text: Perfect inside of a large C&C cage for guinea pigs, bunnies, or ferrets, and would also be great in a playpen. They are initially freaked out my crinkle, but this sound can be lessened by laying a towel on the inside. Makes my babys' cage look classy, and they can litterally play in and around this for hours before they get tired and take a nap. The tunnel is 2.5 14" grids long
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Not sneaky enough :(
customer_reviews.text: None of my cats liked these tunnels at all. From 8 week old kittens, to 11 year old lazy cat, all of them avoided the tunnels. Maybe part of it was the loud crinkly noise it makes when you touch them. It makes it completely impossible to be sneaky. The kittens love hiding places and waiting for unsuspecting feet to walk by so they can ATTACK! Kind of hard to be stealthy though when your hiding place is super loud whenever you move slightly. Oh well, returned.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: but they don't run through it like I thought they would
customer_reviews.text: My cats haven't really figured this one out yet lol, they have stuck their head in a few times and wandered slowly in and out of it, but they don't run through it like I thought they would. Maybe in time they will. On the plus side it is gorgeous and looks great with my decor, so I don't mind leaving it out for them.
customer_reviews.author: Raylene Rutland

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: My two young cats absolutely love this. I only got one tunnel due to floor size but they have a ball with this. They are both one year old now and are full of energy - and this gets a serious work out during their play time. It's very well made and I think the crinkle sound adds to their fun. Great price for this product; made well, expect it will last quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: RMQ

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This is the second tunnel I've bought for my cat. I got this one to attach to the three way tunnels. He loved the first one so much, I knew he would love the longer tunnel too. He's so funny and entertaining when he's playing in them. Now that I've added the longer tunnel, he even will sleep inside there sometimes. I knew my cat would love these because he's the type of cat who likes to crawl inside of bags and bury himself under blankets. He plays in these everyday.
customer_reviews.author: sway26

customer_reviews.title: I think this is great for young cats
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great cat toy but sadly my New adoption kitty (11 years old) seems to be afraid of it. I was going to return it but my friends just adopted two kittens brother & sister so I decided to gift it to them. As soon as they opened it the kittens could’t wait to get busy chasing each other through the tunnel. I gave it 4 stars because you man need to consider feline’s age and personality for this.
customer_reviews.author: Ada

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this! She likes to dart through it like a slip and slide. I couldn’t believe how much longer this helped me keep her attention! She’s easily distracted by things and that is frustrating when trying to get her to play and burn off some of her energy. I do wish it was a little wider but she doesn’t seem to mind. She also doesn’t seem to mind the slight crinkling sound the tunnel makes. I thought for sure that would distract her but she doesn’t miss a beat!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Austin

customer_reviews.title: My Cat Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: She had one previously but this one is much nicer looking. I use it for storage for her kitty teasers. When she wants to play she goes in retrieves what she wants to play with, and then sits and looks at me waiting for me to pick it up. Very pleased. Matched it with an indoor outdoor runner. This is where I play with her. Protects the carpet. She considers it her personal rug.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it. I hate it.
customer_reviews.text: Cats love it. I hate it. Don’t forget to put this thing away at night or you will be yanked from your dreams by the candy wrapper-like crinkling of the tunnel while you desperately try to sleep and agonize on whether to get out of your bed and anger stomp the tunnel like Godzilla on her period while cats flee for all 9 of their lives.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a fun time-passer!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my son's cat so has not been used yet. That being said, I was impressed by the way it's made and the toggle and loop idea to hold it flat for storage or fashion it into another configuration for the cat to enjoy. I'm sure Iggy will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Lendi

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with the kitties
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my foster cats, and it is a major hit. They can’t get enough of it. I like that you can buy more and connect them, but even one of these things is a great addition to the play area. It collapses and stores very easily when you want it out of the way. I did have to trim off a few stray threads around the openings, but other than that a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! 100% happy.
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this! What great quality & great price for such an enjoyable play thing for my cats. Love the opening in the top. It is SOOO fun to watch them play & chase one another. I never take it down! They have too much fun w/it & would miss it too much. Best "toy" ever!!! Thank you for making it so fun for them & for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Its lovely to look at
customer_reviews.text: Its Lovely to look at, very beautiful. I put it under the bed where my kitty likes to lay in hopes shed choose tunnel over laying on the floor. NOT. Shes walked through it like twice and now chooses the floor. Perhaps this would be good for others, but I think its cute anyway. It does make a crunchy sound when she has walked into it. But she didnt seem to want to hang out there.
customer_reviews.author: R. Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Happy happy felines 😸
customer_reviews.text: My kitties lovit ! The attached dangling ball soon became a carrry-around toy, and they love crinkley noise the tunnel makes when chasing through it. They like to stalk & play peek-a-boo in the 'portholes'! It's a bit smaller in diameter than expected, but no worries....where a cat can get his head through the rest always follows!! 😸 oh, & the quality appears very well made...cept for that one ball !...I am finding it all over the house, now it's like hide & go-seek as to where it'll turn up next! Lol
customer_reviews.author: högberg

customer_reviews.title: Cats are in love
customer_reviews.text: We have 2, 3 year old cats that love to play. We've been looking for something new to entertain them and keep them moving. Oh my goodness they love this. As soon as we opened it they went crazy and won't leave it alone. They love the noise it has and love taking turns and even fighting over who goes through it. Great toy so glad we got it!
customer_reviews.author: JaysonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very well made, easy to connect, nice quality, good looking
customer_reviews.text: Well made and attractive, nice cushy velour on the outside, super crinkly inside, unfortunately only one of my kitties is interested, mostly when I play with him (he liked to kick from inside where he can be more exuberant than if there was nothing between me and him). The other kitty isn't interested. .... at all.
customer_reviews.author: RPCV 2002

customer_reviews.title: Soft and thick
customer_reviews.text: I use this tunnel for my two bunnies. I bought this to replace a tunnel that my female bunny chewed to death. It makes crinkle sounds when they play in and they seem to like it. It’s a little shorter than I thought it would be but they still enjoy it. I mostly bought it because my female bunny is scared of loud noises and she likes hiding in tunnels whenever she gets scared. She hasn’t managed to bite through it like the last one so I’m happy about that. It’s a soft, thick material.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Drive your cat bananas
customer_reviews.text: At first, Twinkie hated this tube - it makes a crinkly noise that she was afraid of. But I put it into the regular toy rotation and put other toys inside it, and now it is one of her favorite things to attack. Plus I can always hear where she is when I'm in another room. I'm going to get a couple more and link them into a longer tunnel with a loop - that'll drive her nuts.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Kitty Cat Tunnel is a Winner
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to my granddaughter who just adopted a kitty. She said her kitty, “pumpkin” loved the Kitty Cat Tunnel! It looked like it was well made as well. I told them they could also buy additional tunnels that hook to this one to make an even bigger tunnel. Happy granddaughter, happy kitty...what more can you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Morris

customer_reviews.title: Super fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat LOVES this tunnel. She’s abour a year old, so still a pretty playful kitten. She was hesitant at first but after putting a little catnip inside, this thing is like her new home. It’s nice that you can buy multiple and put them together as well! We might have to do that in the future. It is quite loud when it’s moved around. It sounds like plastic grocery bags kind of, so at night it gets a little annoying. But otherwise this thing is great! 5 stars all around!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My cats loves this! I bought 2 and they can be connected together easily. Also folds up nice for storage! Better than any other cheap vinyl tunnel out there. The metal ring is well protected and I don’t see it popping out anytime soon which is what my other tunnel did. I had to throw it away because the metal had poked a hole around the rim and was sticking out. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: D. BEYERS

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this. I have a small kitten (<8 pounds) and a large cat (around 13-14 pounds) and regardless of their size, they both fit through the tunnel. It does wobble around on the floor if you don't have it against something, but my cats seem to like that anyway :) Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kassira

customer_reviews.title: I can't wait to give this gift to my cat ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to give this gift to my cat for Xmas! And thank you to the small business owner who took the time to e-mail me about purchasing this product and make sure it arrived on time and everything. It was very much appreciated, and I also appreciate helping out people in small businesses rather than large, bloated corporations.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Crinkle tunnel of fun
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cats, 1 younger cat loves this runs through it all the time and the other older cat has never touched it haha I guess it depends on your fur baby but worth the money if your cat likes it! Only 4 stars because I have the hardest time folding it back together so when I need to vacuum I just stand it up against the wall
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product (at least for 2 month old kittens). The only two tiny complains: the tunel makes a nose each time kitten passes through it (it's like a crunchy, cellophane unwrapping noise), which is a little annoying; the tunnel is not flexible as I hopped it will be. These are minor issues though, because except that it is a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Agata Tajchert

customer_reviews.title: He liked it when it first got here
customer_reviews.text: But after almost a week, he pretty much stopped playing with it. He's still investigating it occasionally, but it's not really a favorite. Nothing wrong with the toy though - I guess it's just not his type of toy
customer_reviews.author: Melayla

customer_reviews.title: Great fun
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it. One of the wires that holds the tube open on the end poked through fabric, with some minor manipulation(just with hands no tools) it when back in. Two of three cats fit other one is too big just fair warning if your cat is on the big side they might not fit inside, but he still participates in play time with others.
customer_reviews.author: C89

customer_reviews.title: Cats not the least bit interested
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel looks nice and seems well made, but I have two cats and neither are interested. I bought this toy because they are both young and high energy and love to crawl in things. I wanted to give them something to do when no one is home, but they never go near this thing. I've tried playing with them, giving them treats as incentive, and adding catnip (which they go crazy for) but nothing. They just avoid it. I'm returning.
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: Cats love tunnels
customer_reviews.text: This is the 1st cat tunnel I bought - MY mistake was thing it was two tunnels but I'm happy with what I got. Since then I have added another 4 way tunnel. My ONLY caution to tunnel OWNERS - they move around the room, so when you come in the room look at the floor so you don't trip over them.
customer_reviews.author: Brien Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.....just one small issue
customer_reviews.text: This kitty cat tunnel is an absolute blast for our 5-month-old kitten. He is super active and does mad dashes around our place, it is super fun to see him run through these tunnels. We love them. My only issue with them is the elastic loops which connect to the toggles break super easily. So I can't fully connect the tunnels together which was my favorite feature of this product. I have emailed the company to let them know but haven't heard back from them. It really isn't that huge of a deal for me but it is worth noting.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Chicken Lady approved it for Chicks too!
customer_reviews.text: We originally got this Tunnel for my daughters cat, but honestly our chicks have soo much fun with it! Yes Chicks as in baby Chickens! I may be that crazy chicken lady! But it is so cute to see them running though it as it crinkles!!! Who would have thought how much fun a chick would have in a kitty toy! My kiddos have a blast playing with the chicks in the tunnel toy! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber V.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design, but my cats don't seem to like this slick material inside. I thought from the picture that the inside would be soft like the outside. Hari climbed in it once, and out the back. Then she tried to lie on top. Then she dug down in my reusble grocery bags and went to sleep. I'm trying now to put some soft old cloths in the tunnel to attract them again.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller cats
customer_reviews.text: The cats have no complaints, they love it. I love it. I combined the tunnel with a ripple rug and an oversized scratching box, and made a tunnel maze that provides endless entertainment. It is not a good fit for a large cat, however, so my big boy just pounces on it when one of the others is inside.
customer_reviews.author: ilyandra

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 4 stars because of its great customer service. The item is great, not sturdy, but my cats were not interested on it and even scared. I reached out to the seller and I was able to return it with no issues. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it - super cute
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was that it should be more fluffy inside... But I'm a human and the tunnel is not for me heheh The real customer is my cat, who loves to chill inside all the time. So I guess five stars :) If she want fluffy, she stays at the edges. Else, she stays inside. Also a great hiding place for playful moments!
customer_reviews.author: lmrolim

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this because we're "cat-sitting" our granddaughter's cat while she recuperates from severe injuries from a motorcycle accident. This tunnel has kept the cat occupied for a good part of the day! Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES this!! She and my chihuahua play hide and seek and chase each other around it. It's hysterical to watch AND gives them both exercise. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Gray

customer_reviews.title: My Bengal loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: He runs thru it like a high speed train. Then he will most times patiently wait inside until Tess, the ragdoll strolls by so he can jump out of the middle hole n try to scare her to death.
customer_reviews.author: cmagic722

customer_reviews.title: My furry babies love this tunnel and the Zen box you can buy to go with it
customer_reviews.text: Great value. Wonderful quality. Bought to go with the zen house and all 6 of my kitties love it. The Sen box is Bbg enough for 2 small cats to share and for my 23 lb baby, alone, with room to spare. Tunnel is a shorter one than others you can see but you can see that in the picture and description. My furry babies were not disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: KJ Nolan

customer_reviews.title: The Cat Tunnel that is really fun!
customer_reviews.text: Meg and I loved the tunnel. It is really amazing. It is cozy, makes some noise, it is easy to carry and clean. It contains everything a spoiled cat and a Lady Cat love! Congratulations and I will certainly keep looking for more products from this supplier. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Elenice Giusti

customer_reviews.title: It's the cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: It took about 1 hour for the two younger cats to convince themselves that the tunnel was not dangerous --- then they ventured inside and the tunnel only ranks second to any box. This will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cheslin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cat toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat’s favorite toy of all time. Uses it at least two times a day to jump out at us haha. He loves the crinklynoise it makes as he runs through. It is held up now after several months of use.
customer_reviews.author: luv2swim

customer_reviews.title: Probably fine, but my cat doesn't like the sound of the material being moved.
customer_reviews.text: At least MY cat, doesn't like the crinkly sound it makes -- though I suspect a previous owner must have done something using plastic bags that made a similar sound. My previous cat tunnell was made of cloth, and was very good, but a few "accidents" in it caused me to toss it and get a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Ward Christensen

customer_reviews.title: The cats love it. Nice looking too!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking toy, quite elegant so fine to leave in the room and no need to hide! This way the cat/s enjoy playing, and enjoyable for me (and other cats!) to watch. I bought this primarily for my blind cats who don't venture outside, and the crinkling noise can be very appealing as they discover this toy by the noise. I also had in mind one of my more sedentary cats, to get him interested in moving a bit more. Having so many cats I have very little time for interactive playing. I will buy another tunnel soon!
customer_reviews.author: Carina, taking care of 15 cats at home and 110 strays.

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it promises to do!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so thrilled with this Easyology product. I will definitely be purchasing products from them in the future. I am also going to buy some things for my granddaughter as she's now fostering kittens!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made, but cats love it. What do they know? They love boxes!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it, but I don't! It is made using super cheap fabric that collects anything! Lint, dust, hair from cats you didn't even know you had! It isn't a material that can be washed either. Spend a little more money, and get one you both will love.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Jensen

customer_reviews.title: A little bit too small!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the picture on the description you could assume your cat would fit perfectly into the tunnel since the cat doesn’t look that young/small although the cats still use it from time to time. For a really small cat it’d be perfect. The material is very good and I like the fact it has connections to attach it to more tunnels or even the box from the same brand. I also love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Maria A Gonzalez C

customer_reviews.title: Nothing wrong with this except our cats were not at all interested in it
customer_reviews.text: This tunnel is as advertised (tho is slightly smaller than it looks in the photo). There is nothing wrong with it but our cats are just not at all interested in it. We thought it might be the smell so waited several days but no, they just don't want to go in it. So it does not work for all cats.
customer_reviews.author: charliegg

customer_reviews.title: not very intersting for the cat.
customer_reviews.text: I had this out in the living room for a long time. My cat just walked through once while checking it out for the first time. Paid no mind to it after that. Could just be my cat i guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mikewells04

customer_reviews.title: They don't connect well...
customer_reviews.text: So I love the tubes but when you try to connect them it is garbage. They only give you 3 things to put through the hoops but there are 4 hoops. There should really be 4 things. I am having to adjust stuff all the time for our cat. These do not connect well AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Brodie Green

customer_reviews.title: Good quality material, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten loves the tunnel. We got the box and three way and connected all together. Not as large as you would think, yet good size. She likes to hide in the tunnel and jump out in attack mode. She also likes the crinkle sound and it’s a good place to hide from the dogs. Thick and sturdy material, so far, it seems like they are made of really good quality (dogs run over constantly). Would have given 5 stars if box lid fit snug, OR maybe it was designed that way? Overall well worth the price, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help entertain a new kitten. It is well made and she seems to like it. She likes the sound it makes and the adventure (of going through the tunnel) that it provides. She is currently 5 lbs and can go through the tunnel easily. It collapses easily for when we need to clean up our toys for company :)
customer_reviews.author: Faberge

customer_reviews.title: Love the Peekhole and Bungee Ties!
customer_reviews.text: The kittens and older cat all play in it, plus the dog is able to join in because of the peekhole in the middle of it. Very happy with this product and plan on purchasing more since they have bungee ties to attach them together.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra B

customer_reviews.title: Cat's love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats really like this. They will use the tunnel to hide and attack each other. Loads of fun! (Of course a paper sack or box will keep' em happy, too, but the tunnel looks neat in the house.)
customer_reviews.author: James D. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for playful kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I have two VERY playful kittens who absolutely love this tunnel! The “crinkle” sounds it makes when they run through it get them all fired up. One will go inside and swipe her paw out the center opening at the other...they just have a ball with this. As a bonus, it’s luxuriously soft and super cute (we have the giraffe design)! We already had another tunnel, but the fun noise my kitties get from this one makes it their top choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: hole in the middle is awesome - however
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel itself is grade A - very well built, the outside is so soft, hole in the middle is awesome - however, my cat is a 15lb maine coon and did not fit in it!! So i gave to my mom for her cats, who love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two 6-month old kittens and they play with this often. Inside liner gives a sound like crumpling newspaper & they dig that. Overall happy. Not sure if they'll fit it in comfortably as full grown cats though. But it's cheap enough that it's worth having it for their kitten years.
customer_reviews.author: Lil B

customer_reviews.title: Cat would not go near it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat wouldn’t go near it. She loves right cozy places and plays in tissue paper all day. It seemed to smell fine - but it might not have to her. I have no clue. She’s a cat....
customer_reviews.author: Anne H

customer_reviews.title: Cats LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: One of their favorite pass times is playing in this thing. Bought another brand from another store and it attached to the end of this one perfectly. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Flanny

customer_reviews.title: Versatile cat toy is a hit with Milo!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for our cat, Milo, and her first birthday party. She likes to sneak up on it and then jump inside of it. I think the crinkle helps to draw her in even further. She seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I don’t want to give this a bad review. The product itself seems to be of ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t want to give this a bad review. The product itself seems to be of good quality. But my kitty doesn’t like it.. :( it’s very very crinkly. Way more crinkly than I thought. So if you have a cautious/scardy cat... maybe look for another cat tunnel. I will keep it though. I’m hoping she will warm up to it eventually!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All kitties love tunnels
customer_reviews.text: Bunchy likes to run through it if we dangle something on one end, it but it's a little narrow, and he's not full grown. And we tied something to the middle hole which he tore at happily upside down. But he definitely prefers the bigger three way tubes which he has been dashing through for six months now.
customer_reviews.author: DackyJones

customer_reviews.title: Cats Love it
customer_reviews.text: If your cat does not like it at first... don’t think it was a bad buy. Give your cat the chance to get used to it and you will see her running inside and playing with it. Took my kitten some time and now she absolutely loves it. I got her another one after :)
customer_reviews.author: Lucely

customer_reviews.title: Thought it would be fun, but....
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product. However, my 2 adult cats will not play with it due to the crinkling noise the lining makes. They fear it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The tunnel is great, my cat is scared of the crinkly noise. I have tried treats, toys, etc in there and she figures out how to get them out without going inside. So it's a wait and see game. Well made, looks like it would be fun but she is scared of it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Hartwell

customer_reviews.title: it provides fun.
customer_reviews.text: At first my cat just looked at it and walked away, but I realize she does that with everything. Soon we were playing around it and through it and she loves it. I'm sure as she gets bigger she will outgrow it, but for now, it provides fun.
customer_reviews.author: E. DeSantis

customer_reviews.title: Easyology tunnels
customer_reviews.text: I gave this four stars instead of five because of the diameter of the tunnel. I only wished that it was wider and taller. My cats are about 10 lbs each. Otherwise, I am happy with it. Both of my cats were able to fit through (A low crawl). The diameter, in my opinion makes it a little difficult for a cat to stand and walk through. The construction seems sturdy enough and I had no problems attaching the tunnels to the hideaway boxes. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: narcissa

customer_reviews.title: Weird crinkly material
customer_reviews.text: The tub is made of a crinkly substance that makes a loud noise when walked on, that freaks my cats out! Even their curiosity isn't enough to venture inside.
customer_reviews.author: Jen152638

customer_reviews.title: Lots of playtime for kittens.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for some very young foster kittens who seemed uninterested in most toys. They LOVE this. So much fun watching them chase, stalk, and attack each other. May be too small for larger cats but would fit my grown cat as she tries to make tunnels out of everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone.
customer_reviews.text: It took about a day before my kitten would really interact with this tunnel. I had to tempt her by putting her favorite mouse toy in the center and now she is hooked. She loves to run through the tunnel and pounce on the sides just to make the crinkle sound. She also likes to pop through the center hole. The color is pleasing and will fit into a variety of decors and the size is just right for my small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Miss Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My kitty is aging (18 years old) but still likes to play. I invite her to use it by dropping a treat inside the tunnel and watch her retrieve it.
customer_reviews.author: November Gal

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift. I will give for Xmas. It is very well made and can be compact for putting away.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bea

customer_reviews.title: Thought he would like it not so sure
customer_reviews.text: Thought he would like it not so sure, hasn't even touch it yet but it came in great condition if anything it will be fun to buy more and create a maze. It's loud tho lots of crunching noise when moved I put cat nip in it to get him to try it an I'm thinking he may be to big for it we'll see
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Ferret fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our ferrets because they like to chew. This cloth tunnel is very safe for them. No plastic and the paper noise is a plus. They just love it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves climbing through this tunnel, I'm glad ordered it for him. However, it's a little smaller than I expected, my cat is a little bigger but he still fits.
customer_reviews.author: Bergen

customer_reviews.title: pleased overall
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Y shaped tunnel last year and just added this extended tunnel to connect. Good quality and size and my 2 year cat seems to like it and he's a good size boy about 13 lbs.. My 11 year old cat show little interest. I'm thinking of adopting a kitten soon and I'm sure he/she will have a ball it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: INTERACTIVE TOY WITH BENEFITS FOR CATS AND OWNER
customer_reviews.text: I loved watching the cats ACTUALLY MOVING THE EASYOLOGY CAT TUNNEL CLOSER TO THE HEATING VENT! How surprising! They play, chase, scare each other in the tunnel all day. Great activity for the cats. Great calming, yet funny visuals for the owner.
customer_reviews.author: trouble1

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had one big enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great cat toy. My Maine Coon kitten adores playing in it. It's really well constructed and cozy. Unfortunately, at 5 months, she's already growing out of it! I wish there was a larger size!
customer_reviews.author: M L Hill

customer_reviews.title: and the cats love it! They play with it
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats, they interact with each other a LOT! We saw this, ordered it, and it came right on time! It is as advertised, and the cats love it! They play with it, together and by themselves, chasing each other through it or playing by themselves! We do recommend this for cat people, good product...........the cats gave it a 5 paws rating!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat love!
customer_reviews.text: Hide & go seek or peep! Katanna loves this thing more than life! The fact it has the krinkling sounds is all the better! Well made, well priced! Going to be buying another one or two to give her "additions"! 😘
customer_reviews.author: Red Head Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and loud
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice quality however it is way smaller than it seems. Also it’s crinkly sounding, like the loudest crinkles ever. Alarmingly loud. I swear it sounds like a window breaking. Actually scared my cats. If you have a deaf, tiny mouse cat tho, this is for u cuz it’s cute.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boyle

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Didn't care for this cat tunnel at all. Quality was poor compared to the cubes. It only has 3 toggles to attach to the cube even though there are 4 loops on the cube. And even worse, there are only toggles on one end of the tunnel so you can't attach it to 2 cubes which is what my intent was. Returned everything.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk!! Don’t waist your money
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely the worst tunnels I’ve seen. I have a 3.5 month kitten and it’s almost to small. They don’t connect together correctly. The springs are visible and the nest day are really visible. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: })i({

product_meta.title: Easyology Premium Cat Tunnel - Interactive Cat Tube Toy with Crinkle Sound - Best Cat Tunnels for Indoor Cats - Fun Kitty Tunnel for Hiding - Collapsible
feature_bullets: SUPER FUN CAT TOY... Designed to give your cats an incredibly fun maze like experience.
GREAT EXERCISE FOR YOUR CAT... Keep your cat healthy. She'll spend hours running in and out! Perfect Size 36 x 8 x 8 inches.
BEAUTIFUL DESIGN AND CONVENIENT STORAGE... When play time is done, your cat tunnel can be secured easily by velcro.
RELAXING HIDEOUT FOR YOUR PET... Connect your cat tunnel toy maze to the Zen Den And 3 Way Cat Tunnel.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE... This cat tunnel is part of the Easyology Pets FUN STUFF line. If you don't absolutely LOVE . This is our iron-clad commitment to you.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
